MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW12 postcode area of Congleton, affecting properties in Holmes Chapel Road, Black Firs Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.09PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating a generator failure. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.55 PM on 3rd February 2021
